# DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews

- [AcceptChanges and RejectChanges](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/acceptchanges-and-rejectchanges.md): Learn more about: AcceptChanges and RejectChanges
- [Adding a DataTable to a DataSet](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-a-datatable-to-a-dataset.md): Refer to this example code to learn how to create DataTable objects and add them to an existing DataSet in ADO.NET.
- [Adding Columns to a DataTable](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-columns-to-a-datatable.md): A DataTable contains DataColumn objects referenced by the Columns property of the table. Use this example code to add columns to a table in ADO.NET.
- [Adding Data to a DataTable](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-data-to-a-datatable.md): Refer to this example code to add new rows of data to a table in ADO.NET, after you create a DataTable and define its structure using columns and constraints.
- [Adding DataRelations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-datarelations.md): Learn more about: Adding DataRelations
- [Annotating Typed DataSets](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/annotating-typed-datasets.md): Learn more about: Annotating Typed DataSets
- [Applying an XSLT Transform to a DataSet](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/applying-an-xslt-transform-to-a-dataset.md): Learn more about: Applying an XSLT Transform to a DataSet
- [ChildViews and Relations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/childviews-and-relations.md): Learn more about: ChildViews and Relations
- [Consume a DataSet from an XML Web Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/consuming-a-dataset-from-an-xml-web-service.md): Learn more about: Consume a DataSet from an XML web service
- [Copying DataSet Contents](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/copying-dataset-contents.md): Learn more about: Copying DataSet Contents
- [Creating a DataReader](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-datareader.md): Learn more about: Creating a DataReader
- [Creating a DataSet](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-dataset.md): Learn more about: Creating a DataSet
- [Creating a DataTable from a DataView](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-datatable-from-a-dataview.md): Learn more about creating a DataTable from a DataView by calling DataView.ToTable to copy all or some of the data.
- [Creating a DataTable](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-datatable.md): Learn to create a DataTable in ADO.NET, which represents one table of in-memory relational data, to use independently or by other .NET Framework objects.
- [Creating a DataView](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-dataview.md): Learn more about: Creating a DataView
- [Creating AutoIncrement Columns](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-autoincrement-columns.md): Learn more about: Creating AutoIncrement Columns
- [Creating Expression Columns](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-expression-columns.md): Learn more about: Creating Expression Columns
- [DataRow Deletion](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datarow-deletion.md): Learn more about: DataRow Deletion
- [DataRows and DataRowViews](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datarows-and-datarowviews.md): Learn more about: DataRows and DataRowViews
- [DataSet and XmlDataDocument Synchronization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/dataset-and-xmldatadocument-synchronization.md): Learn more about: DataSet and XmlDataDocument Synchronization
- [DataTable Constraints](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatable-constraints.md): Learn more about: DataTable Constraints
- [DataTable Edits](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatable-edits.md): Learn more about: DataTable Edits
- [DataTable Schema Definition](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatable-schema-definition.md): Learn more about: DataTable Schema Definition
- [DataTableReaders](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatablereaders.md): Learn more about: DataTableReaders
- [DataTables](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatables.md): Learn about an ADO.NET DataTable, which represents one table of in-memory relational data, local to the .NET-based application where it resides.
- [DataViews](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/dataviews.md): Learn more about: DataViews
- [Defining Primary Keys](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md): Learn more about: Defining Primary Keys
- [Deriving DataSet Relational Structure from XML Schema (XSD)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/deriving-dataset-relational-structure-from-xml-schema-xsd.md): Learn more about: Deriving DataSet Relational Structure from XML Schema (XSD)

- [Handling DataView Events](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/handling-dataview-events.md): Learn more about: Handling DataView Events
- [DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/index.md): Learn several ways to work with an ADO.NET DataSet, a memory-resident representation of data that provides a consistent relational programming model.
- [Inference Limitations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/inference-limitations.md): Learn more about: Inference Limitations

- [Inferring Tables](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/inferring-tables.md): Learn more about: Inferring Tables
- [Loading a DataSet from XML](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/loading-a-dataset-from-xml.md): Learn how to add contents to an ADO.NET DataSet from XML. The .NET Framework offers flexibility for what to load and the structure of the DataSet.
- [Loading DataSet Schema Information from XML](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/loading-dataset-schema-information-from-xml.md): Learn more about: Loading DataSet Schema Information from XML
